Use natural alternatives: People can use natural alternatives to soap such as mud, sand, or clay to clean their bodies. They can also use water to wash themselves.
Use waterless soap: Waterless soap is a product that uses alcohol as a base instead of water. It can be used to clean the skin without the need for water.
Use hand sanitizer: Hand sanitizer can be used to clean hands and kill germs. It is a convenient alternative to soap and water.
Use dry soap: Dry soap is a product that is made from a mixture of soap and powder. It can be used to clean the skin without the need for water.
Use a cleaning cloth: People can use a cleaning cloth to wipe their skin and remove dirt and sweat. They can also use a toothbrush to clean their teeth and mouth.
